milestone.name: Side Jobs
milestone.desc: The contractors of Crime.net provide you with side jobs, giving you additional objectives during heists.

milestone.name: SWAT Van Turret
milestone.desc: SWAT units are trying new ways to beat the crime wave that has been growing rapidly the past years.

milestone.name: The Butcher Mod Pack
milestone.desc: There’s a new sheriff in town and she’s got a shipment of new weapon modifications ready to be used by the career criminals of D.C.

milestone.name: Heist Updates
milestone.desc: The contractors of Crime.net provide you with side jobs, giving you additional objectives during heists.

milestone.name: The Car Shop Heist
milestone.desc: It’s time to steal some very good looking cars as fast as possible without anyone noticing.

milestone.name: Golden GRIN Casino Preview
milestone.desc: We will do a preview where we talk about the last job of the Dentist, and what makes it special.

milestone.name: Bonnie Character Pack
milestone.desc: Bonnie is out of jail and wants to get back into her old trade: robbing banks.

milestone.name: 10 Heisters flown to L.A.
milestone.desc: We will fly 10 heisters to Los Angeles during the summer to spend time with us in the OVERKILL crew.

milestone.name: Hoxton Revenge Heist
milestone.desc: You saved Hoxton from prison and raided the FBI headquarters. Now it’s time to find out who framed him.

milestone.name: PAYDAYCON L.A.
milestone.desc: For the first time ever, we host a PAYDAY convention in Los Angeles.
